        public int getModulus()
        Returns:
        the modulus

      • getLeft

        public Counter getLeft()
        Returns the Counter to the left attached to this Counter. Returns null if there is no Counter to the left.
        Returns:
        the left

      • getDigit

        public int getDigit()
        Returns:
        the digit

      • setDigit

        public void setDigit(int digit)
        Parameters:
        digit - the digit to set

      • increment

        public void increment()
        Increment this counter. If it rolls over, its left Counter is also incremented if it exists.

      • getCount

        public int getCount()
        Return the count of this Counter combined with any Counter to its left.
        Returns:
        the count

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a String representation of the Counter's total count (including its left neighbour).
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the String representation
